summary: Completed frontend testing of location colors in Equipamentos list and inline avaria description editing in EquipamentoDetail. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: Frontend Equipamentos.jsx: Location column shows 'Em Manutenção' in RED (text-red-500) for equipamentos with em_manutencao=true
Frontend Equipamentos.jsx: Location column shows 'Em armazém' in GREEN (text-emerald-500) for available equipamentos
Frontend Equipamentos.jsx: Location column shows obra name in ORANGE (text-orange-500) for equipamentos assigned to obra
Frontend Equipamentos.jsx: Building2 icon displayed next to obra name in orange
Frontend Equipamentos.jsx: AlertTriangle icon displayed next to 'Em Manutenção' text in red
Frontend Equipamentos.jsx: Green dot indicator displayed next to 'Em armazém' text
Frontend EquipamentoDetail.jsx: Pencil icon (data-testid='editar-avaria-btn') visible next to avaria description
Frontend EquipamentoDetail.jsx: Clicking pencil icon shows inline textarea for editing
Frontend EquipamentoDetail.jsx: 'Guardar' button appears in edit mode
Frontend EquipamentoDetail.jsx: 'Cancelar' button appears in edit mode
Frontend EquipamentoDetail.jsx: Saving description shows success toast 'Descrição da avaria atualizada'
Frontend EquipamentoDetail.jsx: Description updates without losing em_manutencao=true state
API PATCH /api/equipamentos/{id}/manutencao: Updates descricao_avaria while preserving em_manutencao=true
seed_data_creation: Temporarily assigned AB-02 to 'Obra Teste' to verify orange color, then returned to warehouse for cleanup.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Location colors feature fully tested: GREEN (text-emerald-500) for 'Em armazém', ORANGE (text-orange-500) for obra assignment, RED (text-red-500) for 'Em Manutenção'. Inline avaria editing works via pencil icon (data-testid='editar-avaria-btn') in EquipamentoDetail page. AB-01 is the test equipamento in maintenance state.
